description:
Powerful protection against deer ticks, wood ticks, and more. Protect yourself from tick-borne diseases and make sure the only thing you bring back from the great outdoors are smiles.

  • Active ingredient: Icaridin 20%, with 0% DEET
  • Formula is non-irritating, non-greasy and non-allergenic
  • Provides 12-hour protection from ticks
  • Won’t damage plastics or synthetics
name: Ben's Tick Repellent
